name: A Light Near Death
description:
Welcome to Purgatory! Use the Lamp Posts to guide your way to safety!

An angel is trying to help you get back to the living world and avoid death. You have a long life ahead of you, and they're not giving up on you just yet.

Travel the forest in search of items from your past. They will be used in a ritual to bring you back to life. But the Reaper isn't giving up just yet either. Avoid the Reaper by using the lamp posts and lightning to guide you to safety.

Created for the #IGUWinterJam  theme "Light". This one was our first GameJam ever, and we're really excited to share this with you!

Credits:

Devs = Kat "CoralStar" C.  /  Logan B.

Music: Wesley Lo

Artists: Daniel "Spadji" Soriano  /  Soienare
